Reviews.Title: Coolpix is a frigging BEAST of a camera
Reviews.Author: Brandon
Reviews.Content: Simply put, this takes fantastic pictures both far away and extremely close. I paint miniatures as a hobby, and they are about 2 inches tall, and this camera can take super close ups of these minis with ease and the picture quality is awesome, even at such close ranges. Ive also taken several pictures of flowers and outside stuff, and the pictures look fantastic. Completely happy with my purchase

Reviews.Title: Nice camera for the $
Reviews.Author: Sparky53
Reviews.Content: Everything it was advertised to be. Still learning all of the features. Takes very good photos and a strong zoom.

Reviews.Title: Serious piece of camera for its class/type--
Reviews.Author: D. A. Mitzi
Reviews.Content: Looking for a camera for school in-house/marketing purposes and agonized over this one and 2 other comparable cameras (Sony) .... ultimately decided on this one due to several professional reviews and the amount of technology (HD, 30x, editing, pix type etc.) choices this camera provides for its price range/camera type.Few start up features need to be set after the initialization of the camera (by following directions in the provided 'mini' manual -- power-saver time frame a must otherwise it will `shut down' every 30 seconds and will need to `woken up' (set ours to 1 minute),  pixel choice, and sounds per user choice.Light feel to it and can easily be used one-handed, 30x zoom extraordinary with minimal shake/noise, pix clarity out of control in all instances, video mikes (there are 2 on camera body on either side of the flash unit) sound pick up extremely sensitive (there's an extra toggle zoom/macro on the side of lens that makes zooming in and out easier when filming).Features---amazing: in-camera editing, shots per battery life spot on (~ 380 w/ alkaline and much more with lithium), shutter response feather touch, several flash choices.  Auto photo taking setting is nice and there are a lot of pre-set ones to choose from as well and varying pix stylizations.BIG concern was its low light pix taking ability w/out a tripod one of the only points of conflict in reviews---first trial, though, blew it out of the water w/ its superb enhanced low light ability. Used for school performances in low light....needed to take lots of pix with steady hand to get desired shots (deleted the ones that didn't come out just right....who cares...that's what digital photography is all about!) but camera was able to deliver with great results in the end. Its ability to pick up the ambient light and transfer it to the shot is serious! Sure....could have gotten better shots with a tripod/flash but wanted to see how it performed without and was impressed beyond words.Cons:  The lens cover needs to be manually removed and takes some getting used to doing it after turning on camera and before trying to take a shot and the battery flip-cover (in my opinion) is the only real weak link. It seems really flimsy and has a specific way to open/close ---the brackets that keep it attached to camera feel like they'd break off with strong touch or closing that wasn't spot on.The camera can be purchased stand alone or in a package which is comprehensive and complete....the only other item/s purchased were an extra set of lithium rechargeable batteries to have as a back-up set, as it came with a set (as well as a set of 'regular' AA batteries)  It didn't come with the USB flash drive as shown but it did come with a set of  video cables which wasn't show and 2 DVDs (1 for more complete manual and another for photo sharing/editing software).All in all this camera has filled the bill and then some.

Reviews.Title: Over my expectations.
Reviews.Author: cata
Reviews.Content: First, about the camera: I am not an profesional but I can tell you that I make photo to more than 100m and the resolution was over my expectations. Perfectly zoom, perfectly picture and the finality was a great photo. Yes, you can by this camera whithout regret.Second, about the kit: the same it's ok, if you consider that only the card cost a lot.As a conclusion, I recomand this camera to all who want to have more than great pictures.

Reviews.Title: It's my third Nikon.
Reviews.Author: Rebecca D.
Reviews.Content: We love to travel and wanted a bigger zoom lens for scenery. Deciding to buy a camera that wasn't compact (pocket size)took research, but I knew I would be very satisfied with Nikon.  My only issue is many camera features are designed for the right hand, and I am left-handed. No problem, but something to consider along with the size.  The accessory package was a great value with the camera purchase.  The camera case shown is good for storage of accessories, but I use a different case to carry the camera itself.  I printed out the Nikon manual from the included disk, and look forward to trying the many different photo setting options.  Basic UPS delivery was sooner than expected, easily tracked, and arrived in great shape--inside and out.My camera is my art; saving a moment captured in time by photography, is a gift to share with others and save for yourself.

Reviews.Title: Great bargain!
Reviews.Author: Susan W.
Reviews.Content: I'm a beginner photographer and still learning all the bells and whistles but it seems to be a great deal!

Reviews.Title: Amazing deal
Reviews.Author: Franklin M.
Reviews.Content: This camera was not only a great deal but takes fantastic pictures. We have taken this on multiple family trips in different settings with different lighting and this camera performs great.

Reviews.Title: I loved my camera
Reviews.Author: solange m.
Reviews.Content: I'm sorry, but I don't speak english very well. I would like to say that I was very satisfaited with it. thank you  for  your interest  in knowing how I feel.Solange

Reviews.Title: Point & Shoot camera that takes awesome photos!!
Reviews.Author: Caitlin's Mommy "Kristi K"
Reviews.Content: I was tired of taking pictures at my daughter's school functions and having them turn out dark and blurry because I wasn't sitting in the front row.  I wanted a camera that would let me easily take great pictures from the middle of the auditorium (or wherever) and still be able to clearly see my child.  This camera does all that and then some.  Amazing zoom and quality of picture with the convenience of a point & shoot camera.  I LOVE IT!

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Cinnamon Grooms
Reviews.Content: I ordered the red digital camera bundle,  and was pleased with everything.  Very good price for the amount of items that were in the bundle.The camera is a gorgeous candy apple red!! It's easy to use and was pleased that it took great quality pics and video.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: slpeterson
Reviews.Content: Found the perfect light-weight, point and shoot camera!  All my photos are in clear focus and the low-light feature is awesome!  I've yet to use all the features but am looking forward to learning about all of them.

Reviews.Title: It keeps getting better!
Reviews.Author: J. Martin "hobbyholic"
Reviews.Content: This is my fourth Nikon. My first was an EM. My secon, a 2020. My third, an L6. Now my new 820.I am not an expert, but I like to get the most camera I can on a fixed income. This camera does a lot and meets and exceeds all of my exppectations. Being a new entry into the market, it wasn't on sale, but the kit made the decision a "no brainer". I love and use all of the value added accesseries I recieved from "FOCUS CAMERA" in New York.

Reviews.Title: Good buy.
Reviews.Author: Eseosa
Reviews.Content: The Nikon coolpix l820 camera was awesome! Easy to use and lovely pictures even without the flash.I had made up my mind to buy the camera and thought this was a good deal since I get the camera and accessories at about the same prize other sellers offered just the camera.Sadly, the accessories were not all as described and thus I couldn't use them. The  supposed LCD screen protector couldn't fit or stick,the spare battery case for holding used up batteries and distinguishing it from the charged ones was just one(different from the description, the advert said two). The camera bag was far from fit for the camera and looked like,a cheap wannabe of a proper camera bag. I was really scared of getting the camera damaged in the bag so I had to do without the bag the whole time.( I definitely would get a more appropriate camera bag). The tripod was too tiny to do any good, and several other stuff I can now call junk.However, I found the batteries that came with the pack was quite solid compared to some other rechargeable batteries I got. It could hold video recording for a little longer than 7mins from full charge before getting exhausted and would take a very good number of pictures before getting exhausted.

Reviews.Title: Camera is great!
Reviews.Author: Linda Wyatt
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for taking pictures at family events and casual photography. It is great for family gatherings, It is comfortable to hold and takes great photos. The battery life is pretty much as described and I love how quickly I can take multiple shots. I would definitely recommend this camera. The accessory kit is a little bit cheaply made but other than that I am completely satisfied!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Carrie L. Grunewald "clumsycare"
Reviews.Content: I have no experience in photography whatsoever and this camera really does the trick. Everyone loves the pictures I take and how they turn out. I would like to see if there is an attachment lens for moving objects because It doesn't do so well when things/people are moving (to be expected)

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: Happy Mama
Reviews.Content: This camera came as promised and I love all the little extras even though I haven't used some of them yet.  The only problem i have is mine in using the camera ----  I just have to read up a little on some of the special features of the camera.  The automatic takes care of most of my pictures but to use in sunshine, action, etc, (which i know it does) i'm going to have to read up a little more.

Reviews.Title: Nikon rocks
Reviews.Author: Patricia Briggs
Reviews.Content: Great package deal My grand daughter loves it and the pic's it takes are awesome. Super camera and the red color is great.

Reviews.Title: Cool pix camera.
Reviews.Author: Nana
Reviews.Content: Awesome camera. Very please with the easy use. It makes very good pictures and very user friendly. I would purchase again and would highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Camera is great. Vendor and Accessories are Horrible.
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: The company shipped me the wrong camera.  All the accessories were really cheap looking.  The camera bag was twice the size of the camera and is one big, open square so if you want to put extra stuff in there you have it bouncing around right next to the camera. Amazon was awesome about my returning it.  I paid an extra $30 and got the camera and all of the accessories locally...and they are much higher quality.The camera that I ended up buying is the COOLPIX L820 and its awesome! I am an amateur, but I take a ton of pictures and want them to come out really good.  The 30x zoom is great.

Reviews.Title: Great kit!
Reviews.Author: Nancy
Reviews.Content: We just received yesterday - these are replacements from camera stolen from us.the kit is super and the camera, as always, is great!This is the 3rd Coolpix camera in our family.

Reviews.Title: nikon!!
Reviews.Author: jo allen
Reviews.Content: my sister bought this camera in april, so as soon as i got home from colorado trip, igot mine.  love all the functions and the quality.

Reviews.Title: Love the Nikon Coolpix L280
Reviews.Author: Donna Larcen "Arts czarina"
Reviews.Content: Terrific camera if you want something more than a point and shoot. Price is fair and the accessories package is a bargain.

Reviews.Title: CoolPix...TOO COOL
Reviews.Author: Jaz
Reviews.Content: the Nikon L820 met all my expectations.  Ease of use was utmost in my mind.  I'd read all (very few indeed) of the negativereviews and found them nit picky or not at all accurate.  This camera is an excellent value; does a great job !!!

Reviews.Title: Love the camera
Reviews.Author: Chris Callahan
Reviews.Content: I'm glad I bought the package that includes all the little things. Unfortunately, the rechargeable battery pack didn't work. I had it charging over night, then waited and tried the next day for many hours but they never charged. Not sure how to exchange/return just that item. But I really LOVE the camera and super-love the red color. It's a step up from a point-and-shoot, but is still affordable.

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: VilelasPT
Reviews.Content: Everything was in perfect condition and the set was complete just as was supposed to.It was a nice deal.

Reviews.Title: Best Camera ever!
Reviews.Author: cheryl heikkinen
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son for his graduation present. Its awesome, comes with everything you need and takes great pictures.

Reviews.Title: cool camera
Reviews.Author: lkosmalski
Reviews.Content: very easy for me to use, so far it think it is a good camera for someone with little experience

Reviews.Title: Hi
Reviews.Author: Usha
Reviews.Content: The camera is good enough with 30X zoom....but for ladies to carry it will be heavy and I had a defect in the cameras for battery. But the pictures come in clarity than any other cameras.

Reviews.Title: wife pleased
Reviews.Author: dale
Reviews.Content: bought this for my wife, ( I DID GREAT )  she loves it.  Has features of other more expensive brands, but didn't cost a whole lot. i will recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: *** Nikon L820 ***
Reviews.Author: B. Kaiser "B. V. Kaiser"
Reviews.Content: Didn't get a chance to try it out. It was defective right out of the box. Excellent Amazon return service! I was given immediate credit plus free return shipping, and ordered another today. Hope this one works. By the way ... the defect was "Lens Error" upon start-up. Called Nikon and was informed that it was in fact defective. More to come when the new one arrives.August 21, 2013. I received the new replacement camera in two days. This one was perfect. I'm not a pro, but this camera takes very crisp and clear pics and videos. The 'Bundle' package was a nice bonus. Great oversize case, 4 extra batteries and charger, two battery cases for storage, mini tripod, cleaning kit, 16GB SD card .. what more do I need? Great buy, and so far, a very nice unit! Wrote the seller and they recommended the Nikon L820 over the Canon SX500. I have other Canon cameras and they are just fine, but wanted to give Nikon a try. The only downside I can see so far is the delicate battery/SD card compartment door. Only time will tell.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera
Reviews.Author: Shanna R.
Reviews.Content: I gave this camera a 5. I love the ease of use.  Takes great pictures.  I really like the bundle it came with.

Reviews.Title: Mostly pleased
Reviews.Author: Senid
Reviews.Content: The only thing that I did not appreciated was the used multi card reader, package was broken and held together with tape. Got the package last night so haven't had time to try it. .

Reviews.Title: Great camera for my granddaughter who wants to get into photography.
Reviews.Author: Patti R. Traffanstedt "mimmyto3"
Reviews.Content: This was a gift to my granddaughter. She loves the camera, went to a concert and it took great pictures. It is more advanced than what she had, yet not to advanced for her to learn as she moves on in her quest.

ProductInfo.Features:
This Kit includes 12 items all with USA Warranty and manufacturer's supplied accessories
Nikon COOLPIX L820 16 MP Digital Camera with 30x Zoom and Full HD 1080p videos (Red)
16 Gigabyte SDHC Secure Digital Memory Card - Secure Digital USB Card Reader - Universal Memory Card Wallet - Pack of LCD Screen Protectors
4 Rechargeable AA 2900 Mah Nimh Batteries with AC/DC Rapid Battery Charger - 2 (two) 4 Slot Battery Tube Holders - Protective Digital Camera Carrying Case w/ Pockets & Strap
Flexible Legged Mini Table Tripod - Lens Care & Cleaning Kit - HDMI Cable for direct connection to HDTV -  BONUS!! FREE 25 Quality Prints (promo code# on invoice)
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon COOLPIX L820 16 MP Digital Camera with 30x Zoom (Red) + 4 AA Batteries with AC/DC Rapid Charger + 10pc Bundle 16GB Deluxe Accessory Kit
